result.title: Repro-Light Survey Shows: The Majority of Europeans Want Better Workplace LightingResults from a pan-European survey reveal that current lighting in the workplace is not satisfying end-users and their needs, while at the same time it has a big impact on productivity and human well-being.Located in Resources / Projects & Fundings
